message.body: welcome back algo
it's good to be back
this is 0.8 speed by the way
I also corrected the second warp, which is supposed to start about halfway through phase 5
but I think it calculated some of the bullet density wrong
it was easier than it was supposed to be
but I'll have you know it's been many hours and I have not beaten this from this warp once
it's so strange seeing you playing something that is not purple and fast
@xoryla yeah, it's quite the adjustment
but I also think last tis is very cool, just like destruction state
particularly phase 5
purple game is thankfully done
now onward to the black game

no, I don't think so
those streams should be allowed by the terms of service, since the ban was reversed
they won't be on this account since it's too risky (because of twitch's lack of due diligence when deciding to ban people)
but I will do them on my account called "kenshi_professional"
so you can follow that if you want to see those
so itll be on kenshi something something?
yeah, professional
yes

this is the second half

Clap Clap Clap
that's the spirit!
fish to DS to last tis
steady incline
now the first half of the phase is relatively free
but the second half, not so much
when i first used the right warp I didn't know that it goes for a second half of the phase, so i got absolutely surprised that i beat it almost with firsttry and i thought i cleared the phase
LOL
i kinda didn't know the exact duration of the phase
it is still much harder than the first half, from what I can tell, so that is very good
although like I said the version of the second warp in the original practice tool is easier than the actual second half of phase 5
oh, that's even better lmao
i guess i missed the information
how does it differ?
so, the way the phase works, is that the bullets come out once every 2 seconds at the beginning, gradually getting faster, until they come out once every second at the end
in the practice tool, the halfway warp starts the bullet density at maybe once every 1.7 seconds
I do not know the exact number
phase 5 looks fun
but it's halfway so it should be 1.5 instead
